r.s: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP.
r.d:
PHP_Compat provides missing functionality in the form of Constants and Functions for older versions of PHP.
Constants: * E_STRICT * PATH_SEPARATOR * STDIN, STDOUT, STDERR * FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH, FILE_IGNORE_NEW_LINES, FILE_SKIP_EMPTY_LINES, FILE_APPEND, FILE_NO_DEFAULT_CONTEXT
Functions: * array_change_key_case * array_chunk * array_combine * array_diff_assoc * array_udiff * array_udiff_assoc * file_get_contents * file_put_contents * fprintf * http_build_query * is_a * scandir * str_ireplace * str_split * stripos * strripos * var_export * vprintf * vsprintf
r.n:
Added more components: * array_change_key_case * array_chunk * array_diff_assoc * vprintf * vsprintf * var_export
Fixed behaviour of stripos/strripos - searches for whole needle (PHP5 behaviour).
